title: Validate SSL Decrypt policy "OS Family"  info template "OS family can only be detected if Client is deployed on the device."
custom_steps:
- Login to tenant and go to Policies -> SSL Decryption policy
- click on "New Policy"
- In Match Criteria -> click on Add Criteria
- Select OS Family and few values (such as Windows)
- Verify info template as "OS family can only be detected if Client is deployed on the device." below OS Family box
custom_expected: There should be INFO template as "OS family can only be detected if Client is deployed on the device." below OS Family box
